page.title: 13SCHOOL DAYS
page.content: We get up at about seven o'clock,dress,have breakfast and go to school at about eight fifty.We study from nine until twelve and from one to three fifteen, with a break of one hour for lunch.At our{Primary school we study maths,english,history, science,geography,religious education and physical education.We study these subject in topic or projects.When we leave primary school at eleven we go to{secondary school}until we are sixteen,if we are lucky and pass our exams we may be able to go to college. If we don't go to{college}we may get a {job or might be unemployed. At our school we have classes grouped by age and have about thirty-two children in each class.In 1985 we have about two hundred and fifty girls and boys in our school.
